CVRP Customer Node

class problem.cvrp.customer.CustomerCvrp(node_id: int, x: int, y: int, demand: int)
getCoordinates()

Method to get the coordinates (the x and y position of the node)

Returns

A tuple of int representing the x and y position of the customer node

Return type

Tuple[int, int]
